title: Arabic 4
text: I loved thy creation, hence I created thee. Wherefore, do thou love Me, that I may name thy name and fill thy soul with the spirit of life.

prev.title: Arabic 3
prev.text: Veiled in My immemorial being and in the ancient eternity of My essence, I knew My love for thee; therefore I created thee, have engraved on thee Mine image and revealed to thee My beauty.

next.title: Arabic 5
next.text: Love Me, that I may love thee. If thou lovest Me not, My love can in no wise reach thee. Know this, O servant.
